title-group.article-title: An Improved Version of Marti's Method for Solving Ill-Posed Linear Integral Equations

abstract.p: We propose an algorithm for solving linear integral equations of the first kind that can be viewed as a variant of Marti's method; as opposed to that method, our algorithm leads to optimal convergence rates (also with noisy data).
